caption.p: Influence of anthropogenic emissions on CHDHN events in India. ( a) Multi-ensemble mean of ratio of 3-day CHDHN in the Hist to that in HistNat scenario during the period 1975â€“2013 based on 50 simulation from CAM5.1 model under the C20C+ D&A project. CHDHN ratio is estimated using 3-day moving mean daily temperature values, and ( b) same as in ( a) but for 1-day CHDHN ratio estimated using daily temperature data. ( c) Empirical probability distribution of the number of CHDHN events in Hist (red), and HistNat (blue) scenarios based on 3-day mean moving mean daily temperature (solid line), and daily temperature (dashed line). The figure was developed using the Generic Mapping Tools (GMT, https://www.soest.hawaii.edu/gmt/).
